message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I'm willing to sell it for $12,000. It's a fantastic opportunity!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  While I can't go as low as $10,000, I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $10,800. I hope this aligns better with what you're able to offer.
